definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Cytokines are small, soluble proteins with pleiotropic effects on a variety of cell types.

sentences.english: The hecklers were conducted away from the hall at the request of the Chairman.
sentences.chinese: 主席要求把搗蛋分子強行趕出大廳。

sentences.english: That way, they wouldn’t have to worry about encountering poachers and other dangerous humans.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就不必擔心他們遭遇偷獵者和其他危險分子了。

sentences.english: The more dye molecules there are, the more light is lost.

sentences.english: The hawkish Cho believed the Separatists had attacked Glid Station.

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.

sentences.english: In his latest article he lashed into those terrorists.

sentences.english: Finally, the molecular distillation is performed to obtain medical-grade high-purity glycerin.
